Title: I will fix wordpress not sending email issue with SMTP in few hrs
Description:
If your website is not sending admin emails, contact form notifications, Woocommerce emails, or campaign emails; there is a problem with its SMTP. I do "wordpress fix" and "wordpress bug fix".
Reason:
WordPress 
uses the 
wp_mail()
 function for emails. It's not reliable, so it stops sending emails.
My approach:
I'll configure the 
SMTP server 
on your WordPress website. The SMTP server makes sure every email is delivered to where it belongs.
 
I test the process before delivering the order and ask you to confirm it. If you still seek any support, you can happily request a revision.
Features:
Fix WordPress not sending Email issues
Fix Contact notification issues
Fix WooCommerce Email Issues
Domain and Email verification
Configure or set up the WP Mail SMTP plugin
Creating OAuth consent and ID in Google Developers
Setup the API Keys for different SMTP servers of your choice
Add Client ID and Client Secret
Test the process and send test emails
I offer configuration of the following SMTP servers:
Your Hosting SMTP server
Gmail
G-suit
Zoho Mail
SendinBlue
Sendgrid
Microsoft (Outlook)
cPanel's Emails
Amazon SES (Simple Email Service)
Order Now!
